issues.description: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, fix_vec_sub_asm is declared as an extern symbol rather than exported with a global directive, conflicting with the template (which uses global) and all other solution files. This will prevent the linker from exposing the student’s implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the ‘extern fix_vec_sub_asm’ directive with ‘global fix_vec_sub_asm’ so that the symbol is correctly exported, matching the template and other solution files.

issues.description: The problem statement refers to the function `fix_dot_product` to calculate the dot product of two vectors, but both the template and solution code define and use `fix_vec_dot_asm`. This naming mismatch can confuse students when they look for the function name to implement.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the names by either renaming the function in template and solution to `fix_dot_product`, or update the problem statement to refer to `fix_vec_dot_asm` for consistency.
